name: about
description: Returns more information about the bot

name: commands
description: Return a list of all available commands for Bulbbot

name: github
description: Returns the GitHub repository link

name: help
description: Gets useful information about the provided command

options.name: command
options.description: The command you want to get more information for

name: invite
description: Returns the invite link for the bot and the support server

name: license
description: Returns the license file for the Github repo for the bot

name: ping
description: Returns the API and WebSocket latency

name: privacypolicy
description: Returns the Privacy Policy for the bot

name: uptime
description: Returns the current uptime of the bot

name: channelinfo
description: Returns information about the channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel you want to get information about

name: charinfo
description: Returns information about the characters provided

options.name: string
options.description: The characters you want to info

name: inviteinfo
description: Returns some useful info about a server from the invite link

options.name: invite
options.description: The invite link of the server you want to info

name: messageinfo
description: Returns information about the message provided

options.name: message
options.description: The message you want to get info about

name: roleinfo
description: Returns information about the role provided

options.name: role
options.description: The role you want to get info about

name: server
description: Returns some useful information about the current server

name: userinfo
description: Returns some useful info about a user

options.name: user
options.description: The user you want to info

name: banpool
description: Banpool main command

options.name: create
options.description: Creates a banpool

options.name: name
options.description: The banpool name

options.name: delete
options.description: Deletes the selected banpool

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the banpool that should be deleted

options.name: info
options.description: Returns information about the selected banpool

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the banpool that should be info'd

options.name: invite
options.description: Creates a one-time invite for the selected banpool

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the selected banpool

options.name: join
options.description: Joins the selected banpool

options.name: code
options.description: The invite code of that banpool that you want to join

options.name: leave
options.description: Leaves the selected banpool

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the banpool that you want to leave

options.name: kick
options.description: Kicks the selected server from the selected banpool

options.name: guild_id
options.description: ID of the selected server

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the selected banpool

name: configure
description: Configure main command

options.name: actions_on_info
options.description: Enables the action buttons when using /userinfo

options.name: enabled
options.description: Whether the action buttons should be enabled or not

options.name: automod
options.description: Configures the server automod settings

options.name: add
options.description: Add the selected query to the automod database

options.name: part
options.description: The automod category you want to modify

options.name: items
options.description: The automod items you want to add to the database

options.name: enable
options.description: Enables the automod in the server

options.name: disable
options.description: Disables the automod or the selected automod part

options.name: part
options.description: The automod part you want to enable

options.name: limit
options.description: Configures the automod limits and timeouts

options.name: category
options.description: The category you want to configure

options.name: limit
options.description: How many messages/mentions in X seconds should trigger the automod

options.name: timeout
options.description: How many seconds should messages/mentions be cached for

options.name: punishment
options.description: Configures the automated punishment for the provided category

options.name: category
options.description: The automod category you want to modify

options.name: punishment
options.description: The automated punishment that should be carried out when the check is violated

options.name: remove
options.description: Removes the selected query to the automod database

options.name: part
options.description: The automod category you want to modify

options.name: items
options.description: The automod items you want to remove from the database

options.name: settings
options.description: Displays the current automod settings

options.name: autorole
options.description: Configures the server auto role

options.name: role
options.description: The role which should be assigned to new members

options.name: logging
options.description: Configures the logging module in the selected channel

options.name: type
options.description: The logging module you want to enable

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where you want to enable the logging module

options.name: language
options.description: Changes the server language

options.name: language
options.description: The desired server language

options.name: muterole
options.description: Configures the server mute role

options.name: role
options.description: The role which should be used as mute role

options.name: override
options.description: Configures the clearance overrides in the server

options.name: create
options.description: Creates a clearance override

options.name: type
options.description: The clearance override type

options.name: name
options.description: The command name/role ID

options.name: clearance
options.description: The clearance you want to assign to the override

options.name: delete
options.description: Deletes the selected override

options.name: type
options.description: The override type

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the override that should be deleted

options.name: disable
options.description: Disables the selected command override

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the command you want to disable

options.name: edit
options.description: Edits the selected override

options.name: type
options.description: Type of the override

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the override

options.name: clearance
options.description: The new updated clearance value

options.name: enable
options.description: Enables the selected command

options.name: name
options.description: Name of the command that should be enabled

options.name: list
options.description: Returns a list of all the active overrides

options.name: prefix
options.description: Configures the server prefix

options.name: prefix
options.description: The prefix the bot should listen to

options.name: quick_reasons
options.description: Configures the quick reasons for context commands

options.name: add
options.description: Adds the selected quick reasons to the list

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason that should be added

options.name: remove
options.description: Removes the selected quick reasons from the list

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason that should be removed

options.name: roles_on_leave
options.description: Enables logging of roles when a member leaves the server

options.name: enabled
options.description: Whether roles should be logged or not

options.name: timezone
options.description: Configures the server timezone

options.name: timezone
options.description: The desired server timezone

name: settings
description: Get the settings for the server

name: avatar
description: Gets a users avatar picture

options.name: user
options.description: The user who's avatar you want to retrieve

name: id
description: Parses Discord IDs from the provided text

options.name: text
options.description: The text you want to parse Discord IDs from

name: remind
description: Reminder main command

options.name: list
options.description: Returns a list of all your current active reminders

options.name: remove
options.description: Removes the selected reminder

options.name: reminder
options.description: The ID of the reminder you want to remove

options.name: set
options.description: Sets a reminder

options.name: duration
options.description: The duration after which you should receive the reminder

options.name: reminder
options.description: The reminder message

name: jumbo
description: Sends a bigger version of the given emote(s)

options.name: emojis
options.description: The emoji(s) you want to return in their jumbo version

name: ban
description: Bans or forcebans a user from the server

options.name: user
options.description: The user that should be banned

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the ban

name: cleanban
description: Bans a user and removes all their contexts from the server

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be banned

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the ban

name: crossban
description: Cross-bans the selected user from all connected banpools

options.name: member
options.description: The user that should be cross-banned from all connected banpools

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason for the ban

name: deafen
description: Deafens a member from a Voice Channel they're connected to

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be deafened

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the deafen

name: infraction
description: Manages a given users infractions

options.name: claim
options.description: Claim responsibility over the provided infraction

options.name: infraction
options.description: The infraction ID

options.name: info
options.description: Returns more information about the provided information

options.name: infraction
options.description: The infraction ID

options.name: modsearch
options.description: Searches the database for any infractions where the provided user is the moderator

options.name: user
options.description: The user that should be used as a query

options.name: offendersearch
options.description: Searches the database for infractions where the selected user is marked as the offender

options.name: user
options.description: The user that should be used as a query

options.name: remove
options.description: Removes the selected infraction from the database

options.name: infraction
options.description: The infraction ID

options.name: search
options.description: Searches the database for any infractions where the selected user is the moderator or offender

options.name: user
options.description: The user that should be used as the query

options.name: update
options.description: Updates the selected infraction with the new provided reason

options.name: infraction
options.description: The ID of the infraction that should be updated

options.name: reason
options.description: The new updated reason behind the infraction

name: kick
description: Kicks the selected member from the server

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be kicked

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the kick

name: lockdown
description: Locks/unlocks a selected channel

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel that should be locked/unlocked

options.name: locked
options.description: Whether the channel should be locked or not

name: multiban
description: Bans or forcebans multiple people from a server

options.name: users
options.description: The users that should be banned separated by a space

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the ban

name: multikick
description: Kicks multiple people from a server

options.name: users
options.description: The users that should be kicked separated by a space

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the kick

name: multiunban
description: Unbans multiple people from a server

options.name: users
options.description: The users that should be unbanned separated by a space

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the unban

name: multiwarn
description: Warns multiple selected users

options.name: users
options.description: The users that should be warned separated by a space

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the warn

name: mute
description: Mutes the selected user for the specified amount of time

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be muted

options.name: duration
options.description: The duration for which the should be muted for

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the mute

name: nickname
description: Nicknames a user from the current server

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be nicknamed

options.name: nickname
options.description: The selected user's new nickname

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the nickname change

name: purge
description: Purge main command

options.name: all
options.description: Purges the selected amount of messages in the given channel

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages that should be fetched from the last sent message

options.name: between
options.description: Purges all messages between the two given messages

options.name: message1
options.description: The first message

options.name: message2
options.description: The second message

options.name: bots
options.description: Purges the selected amount of messages sent from bot users

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages that should be fetched from the last sent message

options.name: contains
options.description: Purges the selected amount of messages containing the provided query

options.name: query
options.description: The query that the fetched messages must have

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages that should be fetched from the last sent message

options.name: embeds
options.description: Purges the selected amount of messages if the message contains an embed

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages that should be fetched from the last sent message

options.name: emojis
options.description: Purges the selected amount of messages if the message contains an emoji

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages that should be fetched from the last sent message

options.name: images
options.description: Purges the selected amount of messages if the message contains an image

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages that should be fetched from the last sent message

options.name: user
options.description: Purges the selected amount of messages from the selected member

options.name: member
options.description: The user who's messages should be purged

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages that should be fetched from the last sent message

name: slowmode
description: Sets a slowmode to the selected channel

options.name: duration
options.description: The duration the slowmode should be set to

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel where the slowmode should be edited

name: softban
description: Bans and immediately unbans the selected member from the server

options.name: member
options.description: The user that should be soft-banned

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the soft-ban

name: tempban
description: Temporarily bans the selected member from the server

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be temp-banned

options.name: duration
options.description: The duration the selected user should be banned for

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the tempban

name: unban
description: Unban a user from the server

options.name: user
options.description: The user that should be unbanned

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the unban

name: undeafen
description: Undeafens a member from a Voice Channel they're connected to

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be undeafened

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the undeafen

name: unmute
description: Unmutes the selected member

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be unmuted

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the unmute

name: verification
description: Changes the server verification level

options.name: level
options.description: The desired verification level

name: warn
description: Warns the selected server member

options.name: member
options.description: The member that should be warned

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason behind the warning
